ExpandtestingPracticePage.description: This page provides a practice website for automation testing, offering various elements and examples for testing different automation tools and techniques.

elements.name: Search Input
elements.description: Input field to search for specific examples or elements on the page.

elements.name: Search Button
elements.description: Button to initiate the search based on the input in the search field.

elements.name: Test Cases Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the test cases section.

elements.name: API Testing Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the API testing section.

elements.name: XPath / Css Button
elements.description: Button to navigate to the XPath/CSS section.

assertions: Page contains the header 'Automation Testing Practice WebSite for QA and Developers'

WebInputsPageForAutomationTestingPractic.description: This page is designed to practice and demonstrate web input functionalities for automation testing. It includes number and text input fields, along with buttons to display and clear the inputs.

elements.name: Number Input
elements.description: Input field for entering numeric values.

elements.name: Text Input
elements.description: Input field for entering text values.

elements.name: Display Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to display the entered inputs.

elements.name: Clear Inputs Button
elements.description: Button to clear the entered inputs.

assertions: Header text is 'Web inputs page for Automation Testing Practice'
